name: Cirno's Perfect Snowglide
description:
Cirno's Perfect Snowglide is a touhou fangame about Cirno riding a snowboard. Find every ice crystal and shatter the frog in every stage to beat the game.

This is a fanwork and is not associated with Team Shanghai Alice or ZUN.

Controls:

arrows to move, z or space or enter to jump, escape key to pause

Controllers are supported. Dpad to move, bottom face button to jump, top face button to pause and unpause.

Firefox users may experience high audio latency after a few stage transitions. To fix temporarily, refresh the page. For a permanent fix, download the executable version (windows/linux only) or try in a different browser.
